recipe.ingredients: - chicken breasts (boneless, skinless): 4 pieces (6 ounces each) - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - garlic (minced): 4 cloves - fresh rosemary (chopped): 2 tablespoons - fresh thyme (chopped): 2 tablespoons - lemon zest: from one lemon - broccoli florets: 2 cups - carrots (sliced): 2 cups - salt (optional): 1/4 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/2 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Marinate Chicken: In a small bowl, mix olive oil, minced garlic, chopped rosemary, chopped thyme, lemon zest, optional salt, and black pepper. Coat the chicken breasts with the mixture and let it marinate for at least 30 minutes in the refrigerator. 2. Preheat Oven: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). 3. Prepare Vegetables: On a baking sheet, spread the broccoli florets and sliced carrots. Drizzle with a little olive oil and toss to coat. Season with salt (optional) and pepper to taste. 4. Roast: Place the marinated chicken breasts on the baking sheet with the vegetables. Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender. 5. Serve: Serve the roasted chicken with a side of the flavorful roasted vegetables. Garnish with additional fresh herbs if desired.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 15g, Dietary Fiber: 5g, Sodium: 180mg, Saturated Fat: 2g, Total Fat: 10g, Protein: 35g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 5g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 1288 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Chicken Breasts: 828 calories for 24 ounces of chicken Olive Oil: 239 calories per 2 tablespoons Garlic: 18 calories for 4 cloves Fresh Rosemary: Negligible Fresh Thyme: Negligible Lemon zest: Negligible Broccoli: 62 calories for 2 cups Carrots: 105 calories for 2 cups of sliced Salt, Black Pepper: Negligible - Serving People: 4
